history.proof: intros P Q H a b H0. induction H0. qsimpl time: 1. srun best use: inP_reduceplus.

ctx: intros P Q H a b H0.
exceptions.exn: In environment A : Set A0, A1 : A eqA : A -> A -> Prop plusA : A -> A -> A invA : A -> A minusA, multA : A -> A -> A divA : A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A cs : CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec : forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b} n : nat ltM : mon n -> mon n -> Prop ltM_dec : forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b} os : OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n) P, Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM) H : forall a : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P p, q : list (Term A n) H0 : reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q p q H1 : irreducible A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q q Unable to unify "inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM ?M2184 P" with "reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P p q".

ctx: intros P Q H a b H0.
exceptions.exn: The reference IHreducestar1 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros P Q H a b H0.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

ctx: intros P Q H a b H0.

chat.content:
Help me to prove a theorem in Coq, based on provided proof states including hypotheses and goals. Give a complete proof in only one single code block without explanations, extra definitions. Give a complete proof in one response, only give the proof body, without repeating the definition and "Proof.". Avoid existing names when using intros. Write the commands separately, without ";" and "[cmd|cmd]". Use bullets for structure, NEVER use "{" and "}". When -, + and * are used out, proceed to double versions like --, ++, etc. For example, given proof state:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m
============================
m + S n = S n + m
The hypotheses n, m: nat and IHn: m + n = n + m are given first, then the goal, m + S n = S n + m, separated by =. Expect a response like: 
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.``` 
You do not intros any terms because all terms have already been introduced.

When I give:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m
============================
n, m: nat
your answer should be like:
```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```
Definitions and lemmas related to the proof will be provided, use them accordingly.


Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Set
A1: A
A0: A
eqA: A -> A -> Prop
plusA: A -> A -> A
invA: A -> A
multA: A -> A -> A
minusA: A -> A -> A
divA: A -> forall b : A, ~ eqA b A0 -> A
cs: CoefStructure A A0 A1 eqA plusA invA minusA multA divA
eqA_dec: forall a b : A, {eqA a b} + {~ eqA a b}
n: nat
ltM: mon n -> mon n -> Prop
ltM_dec: forall a b : mon n, {ltM a b} + {ltM b a} + {a = b}
os: OrderStructure (mon n) (zero_mon n) ltM (mult_mon n)

Goal:
forall P Q : list (poly A0 eqA ltM), (forall a : list (Term A n), inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a Q -> inPolySet A A0 eqA n ltM a P) -> forall a b : list (Term A n), reducestar A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec Q a b -> reduceplus A A0 A1 eqA invA minusA multA divA eqA_dec n ltM ltM_dec P a b

Premises:

original: intros P Q H a b H0. induction H0. - apply H. auto. - eapply reduceplus_trans. + apply IHreducestar1. auto. + apply IHreducestar2. auto.
